1.title: Time is infinite, life is short.
content: Time is infinite, life is short. In this short life, man is dying in this world through his great deeds. Again, as a result of reprehensible actions, he survives and dies in this world. Because the person, family, society does not love him; Society, country and nation do not respect him, do not remember him. No one cares about his death.

Humans are just under birth and death. If he was born on earth one day he would have to taste death - this is an eternal truth. Through death, he takes eternal life from the earth, but falls behind in the harvest of his magnificent work - the action for which he survives forever on earth. Human life cannot be measured with a long age line.

If one does not do good deeds in life, then that life is meaningless, useless. No one remembers the man who had that fruitless life. Silent life falls silently. On the contrary, the people of the world respectfully remember the person who keeps life in action and whose work benefits the world and life.

The contribution of the work of that generous human being is being honored in the world and the glory of Renown Lake is spread. Just as a man of fame has no death, so there is no end, because in this world he attains immortality in the glory of his own fame. When renowned dies, his body is destroyed, but his good deeds and immortal fame save him from the people of the world.

Hundreds of years after his death remembers him so, undoubtedly, the true meaning of human life depends on success. Humans come to earth for a certain period of time, and as soon as that time has passed, they leave the world. If in this time period he is able to glorify life with the signature of glorious fame.
Glorious deeds keep him alive from age to age.

2.title: Ignoring reality
content: People are more fascinated by the beauty of the abyss. Wants to get him in the palm of his hand. There is no end to his longing for her, no end to Nabilas. The non-reachable state is the content of human imagination but not the real one.

There is no doubt that the beauty of far-flung beauty is much closer to life than the beauty that is not within reach. The nearest thing you can think of, the easier it is to get. The further thing is not drawn that way. So even the trivial ordinary things near are far more extraordinary than the distant dreamy beauty.

The gap between real and imagined. Humans are children of the earth. Nature's herbs, trees, flowers, birds. All this is his environment. His accustomed life with this earth is moving at a steady pace. Yet people are dreamy. The diverse spectrum of the rainbow in the distant sky touches the human mind.

But what is fleeting, what is out of reach, no matter how big or beautiful, is more interesting than this ever-familiar dusty world. Because the rainbow is not so appealing. It has nothing to do with reality, it is completely unimportant in the realm of life.

People have to live their lives on real hard ground. Ignoring reality is not enough. That is why abstract beauty can be found in the butterfly that flies over its colorful wings in the reach rather than the distant rainbow. The vastness and majesty of the distant beauty captivates the human heart with marriage and bewilderment. But how many unnamed grasses blossomed near his hut, the dewy water in the sheaves of rice, the chirping of soothing birds disappeared in his distant month and returned to his heart. Yet his door does not play.

This is the tragedy of man. But the mother of nature has arranged the endless posers of indescribable beauty with her own hands. But those who are true beauty-lovers, without being tempted by the false illusion of distant illusory beauty, discover the beauty of the world-nature around them in the unique beauty of nature. They are successful practitioners of beauty.

Nothing outside the boundary can be considered consumable. Imaginative sentimentality makes you wander, wandering the natural dream world, it may be something bad for romantic thinking, but in real life. We need to think about how much he needs. Where the world is prose in the state of hunger, the sentimentality of the rainbow color is ridiculous. Therefore, the skyscraper should be planned and maintained in the best way possible. It's best to be content with what you have in hand, without having to worry about getting something at a decent angle.

3.title: Life is dynamic
content: As the saying goes, time and the current of the river do not wait for Kara. That's the rule of life. Life is dynamic. The present tense in the dynamic life is past. Hundreds of attempts in the past in ever cannot be undone therefore, it is better to try to achieve success in the present without regrets for the past.

Happiness and sorrow come in life in turn. To accept the present sufferings without thinking about the happiness of the past is nothing but dishonesty. Because this misery will once again turn into the past, the present will become the future of Golden. Therefore, if we consider every moment of this changing life as a source of enjoyment and happiness, life will never be filled with pain, nor will it end in failure.

According to the eternal law of nature, the sun sets every day and night comes. Countless stars take on indescribable forms in the night sky. Again, in the moonlit night of bright, the flood of Ala removes the darkness and fills the world with slippery light. That is the law of nature.

But if one does not enjoy the appearance of the night, and misses the setting sun at night, and is deprived of the incomparable beauty of the night, and never returns to the lost sun, then he does not return to the past, but from all the joys and sorrows of the present. Is deprived. So instead of living in the happy dreams of the past, one has to simply accept the present and make full use of it and enjoy it.

Life can be enriched by building on the present in the light of past experiences. Therefore, it is wise to move forward by accepting the present without regretting what has gone on. For those who despair of the past, their lives are filled with failure and despair. Because of the remembrance of past memories from the present and future potential of the future.

4.title: Perseverance of truth is difficult
content: Although this universe and human life is based on eternal truth, truth-falsehood, good-mind are intertwined in human life. The real glory of achievement and life lies in accepting the truth easily and fluently, no matter what happens in the world, good or bad. It is through truth that human life becomes brighter in meaning.

The way of life on earth is thorny. There are obstacles and conflicts in every position. There is happiness in my family, there is danger, there is humiliation and humiliation. There is the right of fear and danger, there is the pain of despair, there is the juice of defeat, and there is the heartbreak of grief and sorrow. All of these are characteristics of life, eternal, everlasting.

Therefore, I have to stand in the face of eternity effortlessly. Tolerance is to be won by fighting the battle of life. There is the success of bad in overcoming obstacles, there is the glory of humanity. The flow of human life is constantly changing. Here no one gets the constant happiness of the constant happiness.

Yet when people are exposed to the sea of happiness, if suddenly sorrow comes, people become helpless and hopeless. But when people simply learn to accept the rhythm of life, life becomes easier and more beautiful. In fact, good and evil are the backdrop to the difficult realities of life. As a result, it is in the interest of humanity to accept the truth without hesitation, for better or for worse. Of course, it is true that though the truth is real, it is root and light.

As a result, perseverance of truth is difficult. Yet the pursuit of truth should be the goal of life. But in order to protect the truth, it is necessary to be stubborn. In this way, with strong motives, the truth and the destination can be reached only if people are truly honest with their ideals and principles intact.

But the struggle to establish the truth is extremely difficult. Those who are forever remembered in the world did not abandon the truth in the face of various oppressions. The life of the Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him), the founder of Islam, is the brightest example of this. In spite of various physical and mental tortures, he has achieved universal human welfare by engaging in truthfulness.

We see the same in the life of Gautama Buddha or Jesus Christ. Even the example of the philosopher Socrates is sufficient. He was forced into Hemlock poison for telling the truth. Yet, he remained steadfast.

Therefore, the glory and goodness of life lies in simply accepting the truth at any time. We have to be talented to reach the real truth. It is inappropriate to ignore the truth for the sake of happiness or to avoid suffering. In all situations of life, acceptance of the truth must be salty for life. Because the real success of life lies in simply accepting the truth of life.
